Articles.Content:
Greetings space-ers! Never posted on the forums before, but I've been playing KSP about two years now.

Anyway, I love to make orchestral music, and so I've recently created a track "Jool in Prograde" which re-envisions some of the various music tracks from KSP. KSP was the game that got me interested in astronomy to the point of buying a telescope and going on wikipedia-space binges.

Just wanted to get this out there for the KSP players to have a listen. Thoughts are much appreciated. Thanks and keep spacing!

https://soundcloud.com/infinitybound721/jool-in-prograde
I definitely give this a thumbs up. It's great! I wish more people would pay attention to threads like these.

This is very, very nice.

The editor music at the beginning was great.

EDIT:

Welcome aboard!

Man, this is really nice! I loved it especially at the begining when the menu music kicked in.

Keep up the good work!
Welcome to the forums, and incredible job on the music!
Thanks so much guys, and I appreciate the listens!
